name: browserify-test
description: this is a npm browserify test

scripts.dev: browserify test.js -t envify -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] --debug | exorcist bundle.js.map > bundle.js
scripts.build: browserify  test.js -t envify -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] --debug | exorcist bundle.js.map > bundle.js

author: Sylvain Gogel <sylvain.gogel@gmail.com>
